title: Per-project MCP configuration
description: Allow specifying which MCPs each project uses, configure them in {name}Claude launcher.

acceptanceCriteria.text: ralph-projects add supports --mcps flag: ralph-projects add union ~/union --mcps figma,linear
Store mcps array in projects.json entry
{name}Claude launcher sets up specified MCPs before running claude
Support common MCPs: figma, linear, supabase, browser-tools, context7
MCP setup reads credentials from 1Password if configured, else env vars
